summary: Updated ESP to fix the Access Violation in the "KJ Lore Tattoo 4K.esp".
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple patch for the KJ Lore Tattoo 4K.esp file from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos - Overlay Plugins for RaceMenu[/url] Uploaded by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4727757]Khajiitas[/url].

This fix is super simple. I opened the esp in the creation kit, made a duplicate of the quest file and deleted the old one. This fixed the issue.
Tested and works.

This fix obviously requires the original mod, with the 4k Lore Tattoo optional file. Simply overwrite the original.
(Personally i merge all tatto/overlay files I use, which was how I discovered this file causes an access violation in TES5Edit)

All credit goes to the original author.
author: Caveat
